review_title: It's not bad, for a strictly casual game
one_reviews_text: This game is minimal, to put it mildly. Aim for targets, dodge projectiles, that's it. It feels like a mobile-game adapted to VR: Simple in concept, and with the ever-present annoying knowledge that spending a little real money would give you an advantage. That said, it's not a bad little game - it's a fun way to get in the mood for something more demanding. I wouldn't want to spend more than a couple of quid for it. It's very much a casual game - something you can dip in to for a few minutes when you feel like it.

I really enjoyed playing this. It provides some good excercise but not so much that you'll be exhausted afterwards. The graphics are nice & it runs very smoothly. I particularly loved the music. PLEASE CAN ANYONE TELL ME THE NAME OF THE ARTIST THAT DID THE SOUNDTRACK? I LOVE IT. Thanks.
review_feedback: Thank you so much! Please write on games@vicovr.com

one_reviews_text: This game provides a great arm workout and fun to play too.
Lovely game about the war with frogs :) It forces you to try hard and move a lot to fly far, moving children will like it very much. Can you make a network war on airplanes?
Beautiful game. I play more and have fun!
